titles: The banner of love, under which the Royal Army is preserved, and safely conducted being a clear and perfect way out of wars & contentions : with a short testimony unto the way of peace, given forth for the edification and comfort of all that truly fear God / written by ... William Smith.
author: Smith, William, d. 1673.
notes: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Army --  Religious aspects.
